name: Rogue Boss
description:
Be the boss of your own dungeon! After years of frustrated and fruitless grind, you decided to take action and establish your own dungeon.

Be careful, though, there are always adventurers on the lookout for shiny new loot, and they're coming for you!

Defend your dungeon while resurrecting fallen intruders for your undead army. Shall you fail, do not worry, as your years of grind made your necromancer OpieOP.
